availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel S. Jones (Louisville, Kentucky, cigar maker.)

body.p: Pennsylvania native. Married to Nancy A. Jones. Father of William, Simon N., Edward. C., Mary Bell, Samuel Thomas, Nanette E., Sherman W., and Ora A. Jones. Tobacconist in Louisville, Kentucky 1850. Cigar maker in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville District 2, p. 151B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville Ward 4, p. 37.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville Ward 5, p. 536A.
Find A Grave, "Samuel S. Jones (1813-1874)," Memorial #139624765, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/139624765 (accessed August 7, 2019).
